article_title: What 5 presidential candidates said in CNY on Obamacare, college tuition, more
article_text: While campaigning in CNY for the New York primary, Republican candidates John Kasich, Ted Cruz and Donald Trump share their thoughts on The Affordable Care Act and what they will do about it if they are elected president.
